channel.title: Which projects are being developed on Radix?
channel.description:
The amount of projects on Radix grows rapidly. A good place to start exploring these projects, is [Radix List](https://www.radixlist.com/). It attempts to collect and categorize all projects on Radix.
Some noteworthy projects are: * **OciSwap**, a decentralized exchange which is scheduled to launch on day 1 of [Babylon](https://radixtalk.com/t/what-is-the-radix-roadmap/123). Similarly, DefiPlaza and CERBY will also be launching DEX initiatives on Radix. * **Doge³**, the first memecoin on Radix, which will be listed on VinDAX as of 7 January, 2022. There are plenty other memecoins as well, such as Samusky and DIX. * **CerbyMask**, a browser wallet * **Nerds Republic**, the first NFT project. Other NFT projects include Abandoned Scorpions and HOARD.

item.title: Which projects are being developed on Radix?
item.dc:creator: Yo1234
item.description:
The amount of projects on Radix grows rapidly. A good place to start exploring these projects, is Radix List. It attempts to collect and categorize all projects on Radix.

Some noteworthy projects are:

  • OciSwap, a decentralized exchange which is scheduled to launch on day 1 of Babylon. Similarly, DefiPlaza and CERBY will also be launching DEX initiatives on Radix.
  • Doge³, the first memecoin on Radix, which will be listed on VinDAX as of 7 January, 2022. There are plenty other memecoins as well, such as Samusky and DIX.
  • CerbyMask, a browser wallet
  • Nerds Republic, the first NFT project. Other NFT projects include Abandoned Scorpions and HOARD.

Read full topic
